   20: %%
   21: 
   22: %% 
   23: %% ts:run(inets, httpc_proxy_SUITE, [batch]).
   24: %% ct:run("../inets_test", httpc_proxy_SUITE).
   25: %%
   26: 
   27: -module(httpc_proxy_SUITE).
   28: 
   29: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   30: 
   31: -include_lib("kernel/include/file.hrl").
   32: -include("inets_test_lib.hrl").
   33: 
   34: %% Note: This directive should only be used in test suites.
   35: -compile(export_all).
   36: 
   37: -define(LOCAL_PROXY_SCRIPT, "server_proxy.sh").
   38: -define(p(F, A), % Debug printout
   39: 	begin
   40: 	    io:format(
   41: 	      "~w ~w: " ++ begin F end,
   42: 	      [self(),?MODULE] ++ begin A end)
   43: 	end).
   44: 
   45: -define(SSL_NO_VERIFY, {ssl, [{verify, verify_none}]}).
   46: 
   47: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   48: %% Common Test interface functions -----------------------------------
   49: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   50: 
   51: suite() ->
   52:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]}].
   53: 
   54: all() ->
   55:     [{group,local_proxy},
   56:      {group,local_proxy_https}].
   57: 
   58: groups() -> 
   59:     [{local_proxy,[],
   60:       [http_emulate_lower_versions
   61:        |local_proxy_cases()]},
   62:      {local_proxy_https,[],
   63:       local_proxy_cases() ++ local_proxy_https_cases()}].
   64: 
   65: %% internal functions
   66: 
   67: local_proxy_cases() ->
   68:     [http_head,
   69:      http_get,
   70:      http_options,
   71:      http_trace,
   72:      http_post,
   73:      http_put,
   74:      http_delete,
   75:      http_delete_body,
   76:      http_headers,
   77:      http_proxy_auth,
   78:      http_doesnotexist,
   79:      http_stream,
   80:      http_not_modified_otp_6821].
   81: 
   82: local_proxy_https_cases() ->
   83:     [https_connect_error,
   84:      http_timeout].
   85: 
   86: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   87: 
   88: init_per_suite(Config0) ->
   89:     case init_apps(suite_apps(), Config0) of
   90: 	Config when is_list(Config) ->
   91: 	    make_cert_files(Config),
   92: 	    Config;
   93: 	Other ->
   94: 	    Other
   95:     end.
   96: 
   97: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   98:     [app_stop(App) || App <- r(suite_apps())],
   99:     ok.
  100: 
  101: %% internal functions
  102: 
  103: suite_apps() ->
  104:     [asn1,crypto,public_key].
  105:     
  106: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  107: 
  108: init_per_group(local_proxy, Config) ->
  109:     init_local_proxy([{protocol,http}|Config]);
  110: init_per_group(local_proxy_https, Config) ->
  111:     init_local_proxy([{protocol,https}|Config]).
  112: 
  113: end_per_group(Group, Config)
  114:   when
  115:       Group =:= local_proxy;
  116:       Group =:= local_proxy_https ->
  117:     rcmd_local_proxy(["stop"], Config),
  118:     Config;
  119: end_per_group(_, Config) ->
  120:     Config.
  121: 
  122: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  123: 
  124: init_per_testcase(Case, Config0) ->
  125:     ct:timetrap({seconds,30}),
  126:     Apps = apps(Case, Config0),
  127:     case init_apps(Apps, Config0) of
  128: 	Config when is_list(Config) ->
  129: 	    case app_start(inets, Config) of
  130: 		ok ->
  131: 		    Config;
  132: 		Error ->
  133: 		    [app_stop(N) || N <- [inets|r(Apps)]],
  134: 		    ct:fail({could_not_init_inets,Error})
  135: 	    end;
  136: 	E3 ->
  137: 	    E3
  138:     end.
  139: 
  140: end_per_testcase(_Case, Config) ->
  141:     app_stop(inets),
  142:     Config.
  143: 
  144: %% internal functions
  145: 
  146: apps(_Case, Config) ->
  147:     case proplists:get_value(protocol, Config) of
  148: 	https ->
  149: 	    [ssl];
  150: 	_ ->
  151: 	    []
  152:     end.
  153: 
  154: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  155: %% Test Cases --------------------------------------------------------
  156: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  157: 
  158: http_head(doc) ->
  159:     ["Test http/https HEAD request."];
  160: http_head(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  161:     Method = head,
  162:     URL = url("/index.html", Config),
  163:     Request = {URL,[]},
  164:     HttpOpts = [?SSL_NO_VERIFY],
  165:     Opts = [],
  166:     {ok,{{_,200,_},[_|_],[]}} =
  167: 	httpc:request(Method, Request, HttpOpts, Opts),
  168:     ok.
  169: 
  170: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  171: 
  172: http_get(doc) ->
  173:     ["Test http/https GET request."];
  174: http_get(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  175:     Method = get,
  176:     URL = url("/index.html", Config),
  177:     Request = {URL,[]},
  178:     Timeout = timer:seconds(1),
  179:     ConnTimeout = Timeout + timer:seconds(1),
  180: 
  181:     HttpOpts1 = [{timeout,Timeout},{connect_timeout,ConnTimeout},?SSL_NO_VERIFY],
  182:     Opts1 = [],
  183:     {ok,{{_,200,_},[_|_],[_|_]=B1}} =
  184: 	httpc:request(Method, Request, HttpOpts1, Opts1),
  185:     inets_test_lib:check_body(B1),
  186: 
  187:     HttpOpts2 = [?SSL_NO_VERIFY],
  188:     Opts2 = [{body_format,binary}],
  189:     {ok,{{_,200,_},[_|_],B2}} =
  190: 	httpc:request(Method, Request, HttpOpts2, Opts2),
  191:     inets_test_lib:check_body(binary_to_list(B2)).
  192: 
  193: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  194: 
  195: http_options(doc) ->
  196:     ["Perform an OPTIONS request."];
  197: http_options(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  198:     Method = options,
  199:     URL = url("/index.html", Config),
  200:     Request = {URL,[]},
  201:     HttpOpts = [?SSL_NO_VERIFY],
  202:     Opts = [],
  203:     {ok,{{_,200,_},Headers,_}} =
  204: 	httpc:request(Method, Request, HttpOpts, Opts),
  205:     {value,_} = lists:keysearch("allow", 1, Headers),
  206:     ok.
  207: 
  208: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  209: 
  210: http_trace(doc) ->
  211:     ["Perform a TRACE request."];
  212: http_trace(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  213:     Method = trace,
  214:     URL = url("/index.html", Config),
  215:     Request = {URL,[]},
  216:     HttpOpts = [?SSL_NO_VERIFY],
  217:     Opts = [],
  218:     {ok,{{_,200,_},[_|_],"TRACE "++_}} =
  219: 	httpc:request(Method, Request, HttpOpts, Opts),
  220:     ok.
  221: 
  222: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  223: 
  224: http_post(doc) ->
  225:     ["Perform a POST request that goes through a proxy. When the "
  226:      "request goes to an ordinary file it seems the POST data "
  227:      "is ignored."];
  228: http_post(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  229:     Method = post,
  230:     URL = url("/index.html", Config),
  231:     Request = {URL,[],"text/plain","foobar"},
  232:     HttpOpts = [?SSL_NO_VERIFY],
  233:     Opts = [],
  234:     {ok,{{_,200,_},[_|_],[_|_]}} =
  235: 	httpc:request(Method, Request, HttpOpts, Opts),
  236:     ok.
  237: 
  238: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  239: 
  240: http_put(doc) ->
  241:     ["Perform a PUT request. The server will not allow it "
  242:      "but we only test sending the request."];
  243: http_put(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  244:     Method = put,
  245:     URL = url("/put.html", Config),
  246:     Content =
  247: 	"<html><body> <h1>foo</h1> <p>bar</p> </body></html>",
  248:     Request = {URL,[],"html",Content},
  249:     HttpOpts = [?SSL_NO_VERIFY],
  250:     Opts = [],
  251:     {ok,{{_,405,_},[_|_],[_|_]}} =
  252: 	httpc:request(Method, Request, HttpOpts, Opts),
  253:     ok.
  254: 
  255: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  256: 
  257: http_delete(doc) ->
  258:     ["Perform a DELETE request that goes through a proxy. Note the server "
  259:      "will reject the request with a 405 Method Not Allowed,"
  260:      "but this is just a test of sending the request."];
  261: http_delete(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  262:     Method = delete,
  263:     URL = url("/delete.html", Config),
  264:     Request = {URL,[]},
  265:     HttpOpts = [?SSL_NO_VERIFY],
  266:     Opts = [],
  267:     {ok,{{_,405,_},[_|_],[_|_]}} =
  268: 	httpc:request(Method, Request, HttpOpts, Opts),
  269:     ok.
  270: 
  271: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  272: 
  273: http_delete_body(doc) ->
  274:     ["Perform a DELETE request with a content body. The server will not allow it "
  275:      "but we only test sending the request."];
  276: http_delete_body(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  277:     Method = delete,
  278:     URL = url("/delete.html", Config),
  279:     Content = "foo=bar",
  280:     Request = {URL,[],"application/x-www-form-urlencoded",Content},
  281:     HttpOpts = [?SSL_NO_VERIFY],
  282:     Opts = [],
  283:     {ok,{{_,405,_},[_|_],[_|_]}} =
  284:     httpc:request(Method, Request, HttpOpts, Opts),
  285:     ok.
  286: 
  287: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  288: 
  289: http_headers(doc) ->
  290:     ["Use as many request headers as possible"];
  291: http_headers(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  292:     Method = get,
  293:     URL = url("/index.html", Config),
  294:     Headers =
  295: 	[{"Accept",
  296: 	  "text/*, text/html, text/html;level=1, */*"},
  297: 	 {"Accept-Charset",
  298: 	  "iso-8859-5, unicode-1-1;q=0.8"},
  299: 	 {"Accept-Encoding", "*"},
  300: 	 {"Accept-Language",
  301: 	  "sv, en-gb;q=0.8, en;q=0.7"},
  302: 	 {"User-Agent", "inets"},
  303: 	 {"Max-Forwards","5"},
  304: 	 {"Referer",
  305: 	  "http://otp.ericsson.se:8000/product/internal"}],
  306:     Request = {URL,Headers},
  307:     HttpOpts = [?SSL_NO_VERIFY],
  308:     Opts = [],
  309:     {ok,{{_,200,_},[_|_],[_|_]}} =
  310: 	httpc:request(Method, Request, HttpOpts, Opts),
  311:     ok.
  312: 
  313: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  314: 
  315: http_proxy_auth(doc) ->
  316:     ["Test the code for sending of proxy authorization."];
  317: http_proxy_auth(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  318:     %% Our proxy seems to ignore the header, however our proxy
  319:     %% does not requirer an auth header, but we want to know
  320:     %% at least the code for sending the header does not crash!
  321:     Method = get,
  322:     URL = url("/index.html", Config),
  323:     Request = {URL,[]},
  324:     HttpOpts = [{proxy_auth,{"foo","bar"}}, ?SSL_NO_VERIFY],
  325:     Opts = [],
  326:     {ok,{{_,200,_},[_|_],[_|_]}} =
  327: 	httpc:request(Method, Request, HttpOpts, Opts),
  328:     ok.
  329: 
  330: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  331: 
  332: http_doesnotexist(doc) ->
  333:     ["Test that we get a 404 when the page is not found."];
  334: http_doesnotexist(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  335:     Method = get,
  336:     URL = url("/doesnotexist.html", Config),
  337:     Request = {URL,[]},
  338:     HttpOpts = [{proxy_auth,{"foo","bar"}}, ?SSL_NO_VERIFY],
  339:     Opts = [],
  340:     {ok,{{_,404,_},[_|_],[_|_]}} =
  341: 	httpc:request(Method, Request, HttpOpts, Opts),
  342:     ok.
  343: 
  344: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  345: 
  346: http_stream(doc) ->
  347:     ["Test the option stream for asynchronous requests"];
  348: http_stream(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  349:     Method = get,
  350:     URL = url("/index.html", Config),
  351:     Request = {URL,[]},
  352:     HttpOpts = [?SSL_NO_VERIFY],
  353: 
  354:     Opts1 = [{body_format,binary}],
  355:     {ok,{{_,200,_},[_|_],Body}} =
  356: 	httpc:request(Method, Request, HttpOpts, Opts1),
  357: 
  358:     Opts2 = [{sync,false},{stream,self}],
  359:     {ok,RequestId} =
  360: 	httpc:request(Method, Request, HttpOpts, Opts2),
  361:     receive
  362: 	{http,{RequestId,stream_start,[_|_]}} ->
  363: 	    ok
  364:     end,
  365:     case http_stream(RequestId, <<>>) of
  366: 	Body -> ok
  367:     end.
  368:     %% StreamedBody = http_stream(RequestId, <<>>),
  369:     %% Body =:= StreamedBody,
  370:     %% ok.
  371: 
  372: http_stream(RequestId, Body) ->
  373:     receive
  374: 	{http,{RequestId,stream,Bin}} ->
  375: 	    http_stream(RequestId, <<Body/binary,Bin/binary>>);
  376: 	{http,{RequestId,stream_end,_Headers}} ->
  377: 	    Body
  378:     end.
  379: 
  380: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  381: 
  382: http_emulate_lower_versions(doc) ->
  383:     ["Perform requests as 1.0 and 1.1 clients."];
  384: http_emulate_lower_versions(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  385:     Method = get,
  386:     URL = url("/index.html", Config),
  387:     Request = {URL,[]},
  388:     Opts = [],
  389: 
  390:     HttpOpts1 = [{version,"HTTP/1.0"},?SSL_NO_VERIFY],
  391:     {ok,{{_,200,_},[_|_],[_|_]=B2}} =
  392: 	httpc:request(Method, Request, HttpOpts1, Opts),
  393:     inets_test_lib:check_body(B2),
  394: 
  395:     HttpOpts2 = [{version,"HTTP/1.1"},?SSL_NO_VERIFY],
  396:     {ok,{{_,200,_},[_|_],[_|_]=B3}} =
  397: 	httpc:request(Method, Request, HttpOpts2, Opts),
  398:     inets_test_lib:check_body(B3),
  399: 
  400:     ok.
  401: 
  402: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  403: http_not_modified_otp_6821(doc) ->
  404:     ["If unmodified no body should be returned"];
  405: http_not_modified_otp_6821(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  406:     Method = get,
  407:     URL = url("/index.html", Config),
  408:     Opts = [],
  409: 
  410:     Request1 = {URL,[]},
  411:     HttpOpts1 = [?SSL_NO_VERIFY],
  412:     {ok,{{_,200,_},ReplyHeaders,[_|_]}} =
  413: 	 httpc:request(Method, Request1, HttpOpts1, Opts),
  414:      ETag = header_value("etag", ReplyHeaders),
  415:      LastModified = header_value("last-modified", ReplyHeaders),
  416: 
  417:      Request2 =
  418: 	 {URL,
  419: 	  [{"If-None-Match",ETag},
  420: 	   {"If-Modified-Since",LastModified}]},
  421:      HttpOpts2 = [{timeout,15000}, ?SSL_NO_VERIFY], % Limit wait for bug result
  422:      {ok,{{_,304,_},_,[]}} = % Page Unchanged
  423: 	 httpc:request(Method, Request2, HttpOpts2, Opts),
  424: 
  425:      ok.
  426: 
  427: header_value(Name, [{HeaderName,HeaderValue}|Headers]) ->
  428:     case string:to_lower(HeaderName) of
  429: 	Name ->
  430: 	    HeaderValue;
  431: 	_ ->
  432: 	    header_value(Name, Headers)
  433:     end.
  434: 
  435: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  436: https_connect_error(doc) ->
  437:     ["Error from CONNECT tunnel should be returned"];
  438: https_connect_error(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  439:     {HttpServer,HttpPort} = proplists:get_value(http, Config),
  440:     Method = get,
  441:     %% using HTTPS scheme with HTTP port to trigger connection error
  442:     URL = "https://" ++ HttpServer ++ ":" ++
  443:         integer_to_list(HttpPort) ++ "/index.html",
  444:     Opts = [],
  445:     HttpOpts = [?SSL_NO_VERIFY],
  446:     Request = {URL,[]},
  447:     {error,{failed_connect,[_,{tls,_,_}]}} =
  448: 	httpc:request(Method, Request, HttpOpts, Opts).
  449: 
  450: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  451: http_timeout(doc) ->
  452:     ["Test http/https connect and upgrade timeouts."];
  453: http_timeout(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  454:     Method = get,
  455:     URL = url("/index.html", Config),
  456:     Request = {URL,[]},
  457:     Timeout = timer:seconds(1),
  458:     HttpOpts1 = [{timeout, Timeout}, {connect_timeout, 0}, ?SSL_NO_VERIFY],
  459:     {error,
  460:      {failed_connect,
  461:       [{to_address,{"localhost",8000}},
  462:        {inet,[inet],timeout}]}}
  463: 	= httpc:request(Method, Request, HttpOpts1, []),
  464:     ok.
  465: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  466: %% Internal Functions ------------------------------------------------
  467: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  468: 
  469: init_apps([], Config) ->
  470:     Config;
  471: init_apps([App|Apps], Config) ->
  472:     case app_start(App, Config) of
  473: 	ok ->
  474: 	    init_apps(Apps, Config);
  475: 	Error ->
  476: 	    Msg =
  477: 		lists:flatten(
  478: 		  io_lib:format(
  479: 		    "Could not start ~p due to ~p.~n",
  480: 		    [App, Error])),
  481: 	    {skip,Msg}
  482:     end.
  483: 
  484: app_start(App, Config) ->
  485:     try
  486: 	case App of
  487: 	    crypto ->
  488: 		crypto:stop(),
  489: 		ok = crypto:start();
  490: 	    inets ->
  491: 		application:stop(App),
  492: 		ok = application:start(App),
  493: 		case proplists:get_value(proxy, Config) of
  494: 		    undefined -> ok;
  495: 		    {_,ProxySpec} ->
  496: 			ok = httpc:set_options([{proxy,ProxySpec}])
  497: 		end;
  498: 	    _ ->
  499: 		application:stop(App),
  500: 		ok = application:start(App)
  501: 	end
  502:     catch
  503: 	Class:Reason ->
  504: 	    {exception,Class,Reason}
  505:     end.
  506: 
  507: app_stop(App) ->
  508:     application:stop(App).
  509: 
  510: make_cert_files(Config) ->
  511:     ClientFileBase = filename:join([proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config), "client"]),
  512:     ServerFileBase = filename:join([proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config), "server"]),
  513:     GenCertData =
  514:         public_key:pkix_test_data(#{server_chain =>
  515:                                         #{root => [{key, inets_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(1)}, {digest, sha256}],
  516:                                           intermediates => [[{key, inets_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(2)}, {digest, sha256}]],
  517:                                           peer => [{key, inets_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(3)}, {digest, sha256}
  518:                                                   ]},
  519:                                     client_chain =>
  520:                                         #{root => [{key, inets_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(4)},{digest, sha256}],
  521:                                           intermediates => [[{key, inets_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(5)}, {digest, sha256}]],
  522:                                           peer => [{key, inets_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(6)}, {digest, sha256}]}}),
  523:     inets_test_lib:gen_pem_config_files(GenCertData, ClientFileBase, ServerFileBase),
  524:     ok.
  525: 
  526: der_to_pem(File, Entries) ->
  527:     PemBin = public_key:pem_encode(Entries),
  528:     file:write_file(File, PemBin).
  529: 
  530: 
  531: 
  532: url(AbsPath, Config) ->
  533:     Protocol = proplists:get_value(protocol, Config),
  534:     {ServerName,ServerPort} = proplists:get_value(Protocol, Config),
  535:     atom_to_list(Protocol) ++ "://" ++
  536: 	ServerName ++ ":" ++ integer_to_list(ServerPort) ++
  537: 	AbsPath.
  538: 
  539: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  540: 
  541: init_local_proxy(Config) ->
  542:     case os:type() of
  543: 	{unix,_} ->
  544: 	    case rcmd_local_proxy(["start"], Config) of
  545: 		{0,[":STARTED:"++String]} ->
  546: 		    init_local_proxy_string(String, Config);
  547: 		{_,[":SKIP:"++_|_]}=Reason ->
  548: 		    {skip,Reason};
  549: 		Error ->
  550: 		    rcmd_local_proxy(["stop"], Config),
  551: 		    ct:fail({local_proxy_start_failed,Error})
  552: 	    end;
  553: 	_ ->
  554: 	    {skip,"Platform cannot run local proxy start script"}
  555:     end.
  556: 
  557: init_local_proxy_string(String, Config) ->
  558:     {Proxy,Server} = split($|, String),
  559:     {ProxyName,ProxyPort} = split($:, Proxy),
  560:     {ServerName,ServerPorts} = split($:, Server),
  561:     {ServerHttpPort,ServerHttpsPort} = split($:, ServerPorts),
  562:     [{proxy,{local,{{ProxyName,list_to_integer(ProxyPort)},[]}}},
  563:      {http,{ServerName,list_to_integer(ServerHttpPort)}},
  564:      {https,{ServerName,list_to_integer(ServerHttpsPort)}}
  565:      |Config].
  566: 
  567: rcmd_local_proxy(Args, Config) ->
  568:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  569:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  570:     Script = filename:join(DataDir, ?LOCAL_PROXY_SCRIPT),
  571:     rcmd(Script, Args, [{cd,PrivDir}]).
  572: 
  573: rcmd(Cmd, Args, Opts) ->
  574:     Port =
  575: 	erlang:open_port(
  576: 	  {spawn_executable,Cmd},
  577: 	  [{args,Args},{line,80},exit_status,eof,hide|Opts]),
  578:     rcmd_loop(Port, [], [], undefined, false).
  579: 
  580: rcmd_loop(Port, Lines, Buf, Exit, EOF) ->
  581:     receive
  582: 	{Port,{data,{Flag,Line}}} ->
  583: 	    case Flag of
  584: 		noeol ->
  585: 		    rcmd_loop(Port, Lines, r(Line, Buf), Exit, EOF);
  586: 		eol ->
  587: 		    rcmd_loop(Port, [r(Buf, Line)|Lines], [], Exit, EOF)
  588: 	    end;
  589: 	{Port,{exit_status,Status}} when Exit =:= undefined ->
  590: 	    case EOF of
  591: 		true ->
  592: 		    rcmd_close(Port, Lines, Buf, Status);
  593: 		false ->
  594: 		    rcmd_loop(Port, Lines, Buf, Status, EOF)
  595: 	    end;
  596: 	{Port,eof} when EOF =:= false ->
  597: 	    case Exit of
  598: 		undefined ->
  599: 		    rcmd_loop(Port, Lines, Buf, Exit, true);
  600: 		Status ->
  601: 		    rcmd_close(Port, Lines, Buf, Status)
  602: 	    end;
  603: 	{Port,_}=Unexpected ->
  604: 	    ct:fail({unexpected_from_port,Unexpected})
  605:     end.
  606: 
  607: rcmd_close(Port, Lines, Buf, Status) ->
  608:     catch port_close(Port),
  609:     case Buf of
  610: 	[] ->
  611: 	    {Status,Lines};
  612: 	_ ->
  613: 	    {Status,[r(Buf)|Lines]}
  614:     end.
  615: 
  616: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  617: 
  618: %% Split on first match of X in Ys, do not include X in neither part
  619: split(X, Ys) ->
  620:     split(X, Ys, []).
  621: %%
  622: split(X, [X|Ys], Rs) ->
  623:     {r(Rs),Ys};
  624: split(X, [Y|Ys], Rs) ->
  625:     split(X, Ys, [Y|Rs]).
  626: 
  627: r(L) -> lists:reverse(L).
  628: r(L, R) -> lists:reverse(L, R).
